long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Planteen Host gives you all the tools you need to build a web presence for yourself, business, blog, podcast; a complete set of solutions. Planteen Host has a focus on eCommerce, a variety of top-level domains (TLDs) and country code top-level domains (ccTLD)so you can laser in on your target market. Register .COM, .NET, .ORG and other popular domain names in any one of over 100 native languages, ranging from Afrikaans to Vietnamese. Search using English or native character sets. Transfer your domains to Planteen Host — it's fast, automated and risk-free! You keep all the time remaining on your registration and get a 1-year extension at no extra charge.
